content: stitch up sweetness and charm with the beginner-friendly picot play crochet doily pattern whether you want a cute coaster or dainty decor this pattern is perfect for newbies and seasoned crocheters with just a few basic skills you can personalize your home or create thoughtful handmade gifts the doily s compact center and delightful openwork border with playful picots add a joyful touch work through 10 quick rounds to complete this charming piece using leftover yarn customize with color - from whites and pastels to bold hues you can even use multiple shades for a fun playful look that reflects your unique style this incredibly adorable doily pattern is free grab some quality yarn a crochet hook and scissors then get ready to enjoy a relaxing project that will liven up your space
